title: History Extra podcast - September 2009 - Part 1
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - September 2009 - Part 1
itunes:subtitle: This month's podcast is a Second World War special. We speak to Dr Dan Todman about the situation on the home front in 1939 and you can hear exclusive extracts from two new BBC Second World War Audiobooks.
description:
This month's podcast is a Second World War special. We speak to Dr Dan Todman about the situation on the home front in 1939 and you can hear exclusive extracts from two new BBC Second World War Audiobooks.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
